content.raw:
It looks to me like the changes here bring the table and solar array heights up to 0.848382m and 0.897m, respectively.  For reference, my (sitting) computer desk is 0.75m tall, and my kitchen counters are 0.9m tall.  I think that for a surface that humans would work on standing up, 0.8m is still a little short; I'd go for closer to 0.9-1m.  That being said, I'm not at all confident about what these work surfaces would be used for, so I'll let you make the final decision there.

In terms of the plug on the end, we talked offline about making the end a large cylinder, which will be easier to grasp.  I think that is a good idea, so I'll wait to look at this further until you do that.
